name: Royal Gold, Inc.
description: Royal Gold, Inc. is a leading precious metals royalty and streaming company based in Denver, Colorado. Founded in 1981, Royal Gold has established a reputation for its strong portfolio of royalty interests in high-quality mining operations globally. The company's primary focus is on gold, but it also has interests in silver and other minerals. Royal Gold acquires and manages royalties, which provide the company with a steady source of revenue without the operational risks associated with traditional mining. As of now, Royal Gold holds royalties on over 40 properties, including some of the world’s most significant gold mines, such as the Penasquito mine in Mexico and the Cortez mine in Nevada. The company’s strategy emphasizes long-term growth through disciplined acquisition of high-quality assets in favorable jurisdictions. Royal Gold is committed to sustainable mining practices and works closely with mining companies to ensure responsible resource extraction. With a strong balance sheet and a commitment to returning value to shareholders, Royal Gold continues to expand its position in the precious metals sector, making it a key player in the global mining industry.
